txt.en: 'You should return to Thorenhad and tell Elrohir of your discoveries -- and victories -- here in Nan Tornaeth. Though you have laid to rest the greatest threat, there is much to do here, and I deem Elrohir may wish to send more Elves to my aid.\n\n'You need but return down the trail east and south. Farewell, [placeholder].'

'You found and defeated a gaunt-man in Nan Tornaeth? I am concerned that such a creature could pass so close to Imladris without being detected. Nevertheless, you deserve our thanks for ridding the world of its presence.\n\n'My father will need to know of this....'
You discovered the presence of a gaunt-man within the ruins of Nan Tornaeth and dispatched it, securing the northern reaches of the Trollshaws.
Elrohir is at Thorenhad, which can be reached by following the trail east and south from Calenthon's camp.\n\nCalenthon suggested that you bring a report to Elrohir at Thorenhad.
